channel.title: Push on Archive of FeedHenry Developer Blog 2012-2016
channel.description: Recent content in Push on Archive of FeedHenry Developer Blog 2012-2016

item.title: Using SNS Push Notifications with Node.js
item.description:
Evan Shortiss, one of our great FeedHenry Developers, has written a really useful introduction on how to use SNS Push Notifications with Node.js.

It assumes no knowledge of the area and works through all of the server-side nitty-gritty. Stay tuned for further information here on how to connect in your mobile client to this.
